entry.def: Defeatism is a way of thinking or talking which suggests that you expect to be unsuccessful.

means.word_mean: 1. acceptance of the inevitability of defeat

auth_sentence.content: She ended the defeatism and pessimism of the post-war period and unleashed a spirit of enterprise.
auth_sentence.res_content: She ended the defeatism and pessimism of the post-war period and unleashed a spirit of enterprise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She ended the defeatism and pessimism of the post-war period and unleashed a spirit of enterprise.
